title: Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier, 1 gallon, Black; low tank indicator; Dish washer safe; Humidity capacity: 142ml/h; Aroma tray; 3 speeds; mechanical knob; covers 320 sq. ft. area, weight: 6.33 lbs
descriptions: Experience optimal comfort and wellness with the Mainstays Cool Mist Humidifier in sleek black. This high-performance humidifier boasts a 1-gallon tank capacity, providing a steady flow of cool mist for up to 142ml per hour. Say goodbye to dry air with its 3-speed settings and mechanical knob control for customized humidity levels. The low tank indicator ensures you never run out of mist, while the dishwasher-safe design makes cleaning a breeze. Perfect for rooms up to 320 sq. ft., this humidifier also features an aroma tray for a touch of relaxation. Don't miss out on this essential addition to your home!

Choose from 3 speed settings with the easy-to-use mechanical knob. Covering up to 320 sq. ft., this humidifier is perfect for bedrooms, living rooms, and more. Don't miss out on this essential addition to your home for a healthier environment.
